description.title: TPS - key storage, configurable number of external concurrent clients
description.purpose: The test uses N clients to perform the bulk loading of transactions into the network concurrently, where transactions are setting a key value pair in the KeyStorage contract. The test looks to see if the TPS can be increased using multiple clients feeding transactions at the same time, and also the trend of the processing i.e. do we see synchronised pauses implying that the network is at issue.
